<title
    level="1"
    right="Item 10"
    pfs="Standard"
>
[Sun Sight](/Equipment.aspx?ID=2218)
</title>

<traits>
<trait label="Invested" url="/Traits.aspx?ID=98" />
<trait label="Magical" url="/Traits.aspx?ID=103" />
<trait label="Tattoo" url="/Traits.aspx?ID=262" />
</traits>

<column gap="tiny">

**Source** [Treasure Vault](/Sources.aspx?ID=191) pg. 122 <sup>2.0</sup>

**Price** 850 gp

<row gap="medium">

**Usage** tattooed on the body

</row>

<row gap="medium">

 

 

 
</row>

</column>

---

Placed under the eyes like rays of light, this tattoo burns away illusions with the unmerciful brilliance of the sun. You gain a +2 bonus to Perception checks that involve sight. If you're [dazzled](/Conditions.aspx?ID=7), you receive a new save at the start of each of your turns to end your dazzled condition.

**Activate** <actions string="Single Action to Three Actions" /> ([concentrate](/Traits.aspx?ID=561)) **Frequency** once per day;   **Effect** The tattoo casts a 4th-rank [_blazing bolt_](/Spells.aspx?ID=1450), with the rays emitting from your eyes. The number of actions you spend Activating the tattoo determines _blazing bolt’s_ number of rays. The tattoo also attempts to dispel each illusion on a creature hit by a ray ([counteract](/Rules.aspx?ID=2250) rank 5th, counteract modifier +19).

<column gap="tiny">

</column>
name: Sun Sight
